Package maldiniPaone.databaseConnection

Class ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector

java.lang.Object
maldiniPaone.databaseConnection.ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector
public class ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
This class connects with the database using connections generated by ConnectionPool. This class's methods gets and saves useful data for report and assignment. All methods uses prepared statements to avoid possibility of SQL injections. Results are encapsulated in objects defined in maldiniPaone.utilities

  • Method Details

    • addReport

      protected static java.lang.Integer[] addReport​(java.lang.String username, java.sql.Timestamp time, Location location, java.lang.String note, java.lang.String licensePlate) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Adds report to the database. Gets connection from connection pool and uses it to execute the insertion.
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user who makes the report
      time - : the time stamp corresponding to the report
      location - : the location of the report
      note - : possible notes added by user
      licensePlate - : the license plate in the report in String form
      Returns:
      Integer: the primary key of the bridge table between assignment and report, -1 if the insertion is not possible
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

    • getReportsMadeBy

      protected static java.util.List<Report> getReportsMadeBy​(java.lang.String username) throws DatabaseNotFoundException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets a List of reports done by the user. Gets connection from connection pool and uses it to execute the insertion.
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user who made the reports
      Returns:
      List of Reports : list of reports null if not reports found
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated
      IllegalParameterException - if not valid coordinates are saved

    • getReportCountInLastWeek

      public static java.lang.Integer getReportCountInLastWeek​(Location location) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Gets the number of reports done close to a given location. Gets connection from connection pool and uses it to execute the insertion.
      Parameters:
      location - : the location to which respect the reports are searched
      Returns:
      Integer : the number of reports (0 if no match)
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

      protected static boolean takeAssignment​(java.lang.Integer id, java.lang.String username) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Assigns an AssignmentServlet to an authority
      Parameters:
      id - : the id of the assignment to be taken
      username - : the user name of the authority taking the assignment
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the action is successful; false otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

      Parameters:

      username - : the user name of the authority who terminated the assignment

      gets the list of the assignment associated with the last 100 photos submitted for assignments close to the location given as parameter
      Parameters:
      location - : the location close to which the assignments are searched
      Returns:
      List of Assignments : the assignment found are returned in a List
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated
      IllegalParameterException - if not consistent values are in the database

    • closeTo

      private static java.lang.String closeTo​(java.lang.String base, Location location)
      defines a String in for an SQL condition for indicating a place near to the specified location
      Parameters:
      base - : this variable is the name of the table in which a location is stored. it must contain a longitude and a latitude column
      location - : the location with which the distance must be computed
      Returns:
      String : represents the condition in String usable in a mySql query

    • closeTo

      private static java.lang.String closeTo​(java.lang.String base, Location location, java.lang.Float radius)
      defines a String in for an MySql condition for indicating a place near to the specified location
      Parameters:
      base - : this variable is the name of the table in which a location is stored. it must contain a longitude and a latitude column
      location - : the location with which the distance must be computed
      radius - : the "radius" in which a place is considered close
      Returns:
      String : represents the condition in String usable in a MySql query

    • squareAreaCloseTo

      private static java.lang.String squareAreaCloseTo​(java.lang.String base, Location location, java.lang.Float edge)
      defines a String in for an MySql condition for indicating a place near to the specified location
      Parameters:
      base - : this variable is the name of the table in which a location is stored. it must contain a longitude and a latitude column
      location - : the location with which the distance must be computed
      edge - : the "radius" in which a place is considered close
      Returns:
      String : represents the condition in String usable in a MySql query

      Parameters:
      base - : this variable is the name of the table in which a location is stored. it must contain a longitude and a latitude column
      location - : the location with which the distance must be computed
      Returns:

    • buildReportFromResultSet

      private static Report buildReportFromResultSet​(java.sql.ResultSet rs) throws java.sql.SQLException, IllegalParameterException
      builds report from a row of the result set
      Parameters:
      rs - : the result set set on the correct row
      Returns:
      ReportCreation : the report corresponding to the row of the result set
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - specified field are not available
      IllegalParameterException - if the location in a report has invalid values

    • buildAssignmentFromResultSet

      private static java.util.List<Assignment> buildAssignmentFromResultSet​(java.sql.ResultSet rs) throws java.sql.SQLException, IllegalParameterException
      builds list of Assignments from a result rest
      Parameters:
      rs - : the result set from which the list is created
      Returns:
      List of AssignmentServlet : list of assignment in the result set, empty list if the result contains nothing
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - specified field are not available
      IllegalParameterException - if location in an assignment is not valid
